data.message: The purpose of messenger is to invade your privacy and spy on you.

replies.message:
Lynette, if these reports were true, we'd be concerned too. No one at Facebook is spying on you through your phone's camera or microphone—read more about how we actually use permissions in the Messenger app here: https://www.facebook.com/messengerfacts
-Chantal

There is adocumented historical past of doing untrustworthy things.  you guys no longer have any credibility with many users.  And Lynette, perhaps we should start a betting pool on when they start charging for each use of Messenger.
Facebook liars and how do you spell dieceit. Leave that young lady alone facebrook. She can tell the truth if she wants.
